lyrics.text:
Ko e ‘Otua mo’oni
‘A e Laumālie,
Pea ‘oku kau mo Sīsū,
Ke tau mo’ui ai.

Ko e Laumālie Lelei,
‘O hotau ‘Otua,
‘Oku ngāue mālohi mai,
Ki he kakai hia.

’Oku ne takitala’i,
‘A e loto maka!
Pea toki mafōfoa,
Pea manavahē.

Pea fakatomala ai,
‘A e angakovi;
Pea fakaangavaivai,
Pea loto liliu.

Pea ‘oku tokoni mai,
‘E ho Laumālie
‘A e kakai angavaivai,
‘I he’enau lotu.

Pea ‘oku ne tataki,
‘A e kakai kumi!
Ki hotau Fakaamo’ui
Ko Sīsū Kalaisi.
